授業目的: Students will learn how to improve their presentation skills.
到達目標: At the end of the semester, students will acquire the following skills. 1. speech manners - voice, articulation, eye contact, gestures, speed, etc. 2. how to organise a presentation         3. how to create effective PowerPoint slides
授業の概要・背景: The detailed Course Outline will be provided at the beginning of the semester.
授業方法: Basically face-to-face teaching. However, if students from overseas are not available, we will have Zoom meetings every week.
